patterns: Tell me about Career Development Services
What is the role of CDS at IIT Jammu?
responses: The Career and Development Services (CDS) at IIT Jammu, established in 2018, bridges the gap between students and recruiters. It handles campus placements for all graduating students and offers career planning, job search strategies, and more.
You can contact CDS via email at placements@iitjammu.ac.in or call at 0191 - 2570289. The address is Career Development Services, IIT Jammu, Jagti, NH-44, PO Nagrota, Jammu - 181 221, J&K, India.

patterns: Where can I find CDS on LinkedIn?
responses: You can find CDS on LinkedIn at [this link](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cds-iit-jammu).

patterns: Who is in the CDS team?
Tell me about the CDS team
Who are the faculty members in CDS?
responses: The CDS team includes faculty like Prof. Vinit Jakhetiya (Professor In-charge), Ambika Prasad Shah, Ashutosh Yadav, Chembolu Vinay, Karan Nathwani, Pothukuchi Harish, Sunil Kumar Kashyap, and many others. For detailed contacts, you can reach out via the provided emails.

patterns: How many students got placed in 2024?
What is the highest package at IIT Jammu?
responses: In 2024, 200 students were placed, with 180 securing jobs. The highest package was INR 30 LPA, and the average package was INR 12 LPA. In 2023, 180 students were placed with an average package of INR 11 LPA.

patterns: Where can I find the placement policy?
What is the placement policy at IIT Jammu?
Give me the placement policy document
responses: You can find the placement policy at [this link](https://iitjammu.ac.in/Facilities/cds/Placement%20Policy%E2%80%93%20IIT%20Jammu%20-%20Ver%20III.pdf).

patterns: What is the message from the Director of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the Director's message
responses: The Director, Prof. Manoj Singh Gaur, expresses warm greetings and highlights the vision of IIT Jammu to create tomorrow's world through technological interventions. He shares how the lush green surroundings of IIT Jammu contribute to student growth and development.

patterns: Message from the Professor In-charge of CDS
What does the Professor In-charge of CDS say?
Tell me about the message from the Professor In-charge
responses: Dr. Vinit Jakhetiya, Professor In-charge of CDS, highlights the comprehensive resources provided to students, such as personalized counseling, workshops, and industry partnerships, to guide them towards successful careers.

patterns: Tell me about I3C at IIT Jammu
What is the focus of I3C at IIT Jammu?
responses: I3C (Institute Incubation and Innovation Council) at IIT Jammu fosters a startup ecosystem. It collaborates with JKEDI and other partners to support startups, focusing on sectors like aerospace, defense, and other innovative fields.
Ambika Prasad Shah is part of the CDS faculty team. You can contact him at ambika.shah@iitjammu.ac.in.
Ashutosh Yadav is part of the CDS faculty team. You can contact him at ashutosh.yadav@iitjammu.ac.in.
